abstract: Chinese government confirms it is detaining dissidents Jiang Yefei and Dong Guanping, who had been living in Thailand; both men were turned over by Thai authorities to Chinese police despite having been granted refugee status.
lead_paragraph: Chinese public security officials told a state-run newspaper that the men were in detention on illegal migration charges.

headline.main: China Says It Has Detained 2 Dissidents Sent Back by Thailand
headline.print_headline: China Says It Has Detained 2 Dissidents Sent Back by Thailand

snippet: Chinese public security officials told a state-run newspaper that the men were in detention on illegal migration charges.
